title: Cricket WAG Kyly Clarke treats herself to mani-pedi in Bondi
text:
She's one of Australia's most stylish cricket WAGs.

But Kyly Clarke has proved she makes all of her own fashion choices, as she brought a bottle of nail polish along for a mani-pedi on Tuesday.

The 38-year-old wife of former cricket ace Michael Clarke cut a casual figure on as she arrived at the salon in Bondi.

Casual! With her hair in relaxed, soft waves, Kyly Clarke (pictured) wore minimal make-up as she made the trip to the salon

She wore a slouchy grey top and matching tracksuit bottoms, covering up with a cosy white cardigan.

On her feet she threw on a pair of slides and then changed into thongs for her treatment.

With her hair in relaxed, soft waves, Kyly wore minimal make-up as she made the trip to the salon.

Busy woman: Kyly clutched several shopping bags in her hand, clearly multi-tasking as the businesswoman ran errands in the neighbourhood near her home

She clutched several shopping bags in her hand, clearly multi-tasking as the businesswoman ran errands in the neighbourhood.

Just before arriving at the nail parlour, Kyly was spotted pulling a bottle of nail polish out of her bag and taking it inside.

She's was seen relaxing in the chair as two nail technicians get to work.

Treat yourself Tuesday! Kyly is then seen relaxing in the chair as two nail technicians get to work

Leaving the salon a little while later, Kyly checked out her new nails as she looked down at her thumb.

The lifestyle designer donned oversized sunglasses to protect her eyes from the Sydney sun.

Kyly tied the knot with retired sportsman Michael in 2012, and the couple welcomed their daughter, Kelsey-Lee, in November 2015.
description: She's one of Australia's most stylish cricket WAGs.
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
